name: Jam Quest
description:
LET'S GET READY TO JAM!

Go with the musical flow in this vibrant downtown adventure! The ever hostile Scratch the Wolf has his eyes set on your family's magical guitar, Excalibur, and is dedicated to take it and force the world to dance till they drop! Will you be able to keep up with his wild beats?

• Explore large and vibrant levels in a familiar Beat-Em-Up fashion!
• Fight against hordes of enemies!
• Collect various power-ups for a variety of attacks!
• Fight along with the beat to make your skills even more powerful!
• JAM LIKE THERE'S NO TOMORROW!

Install instructions

General: Unzip the Folder

Windows: Click on the Jam Quest Executable (Must have the Jam Quest Data Folder in the same directory)

Mac: Click on the Jam Quest Mac Folder, click on the executable within the folders.
